Argus Hotel Darwin Located in Darwin's CBD, Argus Hotel Darwin is a short stroll to the mall and the main shopping centre. Walk to Crocosaurus Cove and to the Esplanade and choose from a grand selection of both city and Darwin's waterfront restaurants and bars. Enjoy the plunge pool, sit and relax in the courtyard or keep fit in the fully equipped gym.
